Articles.Content:
Hi guys! I'm making a new video and I could really use your help!

**What I need for the shots are:**

1. Valentina smiling like she normally does.
2. A wide variety of locations and angles
3. 1280x768 resolution if possible to keep everything consistent. (Other resolutions will be accepted too)
4. UI Removed (F2 toggles this by default)

Your names will be added to each shot in the video so people know who took the shot. 

Thank you in advance!

EDIT:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/e9glnr8-VYM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-25T18:26:39Z" title="05/25/2015 06:26  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 25, 2015</time> by Xacktar**
And what about 1920x1080?

Here's Val on Moho, Minmus, and Dres.

![SMCJ9tT.png](http://i.imgur.com/SMCJ9tT.png)

![iEhFnSf.png](http://i.imgur.com/iEhFnSf.png)

![9KKx1VI.png](http://i.imgur.com/9KKx1VI.png)

The Minmus one isn't very good quality because I cropped it a while ago and forgot to save the original, so I had to resize and crop it again to fit the specifications. D: I hope it's still okay.

I could've sworn I had one of Val on Gilly too, I guess I must have forgotten to actually screenshot that moment. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

![val_in_space.jpg](http://www.skyrender.net/lp2/ksp/val_in_space.jpg)

An obligatory "low Kerbin orbit" shot for you.

Piloting an ion probe:

![gq4m6F4.jpg?1](http://i.imgur.com/gq4m6F4.jpg?1)

On Minmus at night:

![J3xn2T7.jpg?1](http://i.imgur.com/J3xn2T7.jpg?1)

You didn't say anything about mods so I assume they're OK... wish I had more varied locales but I haven't sent Val or anyone else much beyond Kerbin's SoI. There's a couple more of her from the same trip in [this post here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/29533-What-did-you-do-in-KSP-today?p=1961498&viewfull=1#post1961498).

Here's a couple from the surface of Eve, depending on whether you meant a small smirk or grinning like a maniac

![pCRqp8R.png](http://i.imgur.com/pCRqp8R.png)

![mjQHj08.png](http://i.imgur.com/mjQHj08.png)

> You didn't say anything about mods so I assume they're OK... wish I had more varied locales but I haven't sent Val or anyone else much beyond Kerbin's SoI. There's a couple more of her from the same trip in [this post here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/29533-What-did-you-do-in-KSP-today?p=1961498&viewfull=1#post1961498).

Yup, that's fine. I just need her happy, smiling face. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thank you guys for the shots!

Here's mine

Mun

![screenshot0_zpsr6fviwtt.png](http://i105.photobucket.com/albums/m236/vixr/screenshot0_zpsr6fviwtt.png)

Arin

![screenshot10_zps11lp9ywl.png](http://i105.photobucket.com/albums/m236/vixr/screenshot10_zps11lp9ywl.png)

Serran...

![screenshot21_zpsboyqryap.png](http://i105.photobucket.com/albums/m236/vixr/screenshot21_zpsboyqryap.png)

Derso...

![screenshot44_zps6qtazrki.png](http://i105.photobucket.com/albums/m236/vixr/screenshot44_zps6qtazrki.png)

Tidus...

![screenshot28_zpsozlrc5dr.png](http://i105.photobucket.com/albums/m236/vixr/screenshot28_zpsozlrc5dr.png)

I think this was one of the first ships I got into a stable orbit in 1.0.

![screenshot5.png](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-3VxC3SB7thA/VWASxqACjDI/AAAAAAAABZw/-95kSG_y3yA/s1280/screenshot5.png)

I bet Jeb doesn't even have one of these...

![kMGeQpO.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/kMGeQpO.jpg)

![at9XOUN.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/at9XOUN.jpg)

![gSD8sRB.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/gSD8sRB.jpg)

![fxQL4yY.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/fxQL4yY.jpg)

+rep for everybody!

Thanks, guys!

I would love to get 10 more people showing me some pictures so everyone gets a fair share in the video. Everyone who has already posted is in it now. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

[![screenshot1852_zps2tdsfnzb.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot1852_zps2tdsfnzb.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot1852_zps2tdsfnzb.png.html)

Can't believe no one has done this yet. Val at Vall:

![lx55yrJ.png](http://i.imgur.com/lx55yrJ.png)![xlRnLSu.png](http://i.imgur.com/xlRnLSu.png)![r46AIOk.png](http://i.imgur.com/r46AIOk.png)

![YErwzZj.png](http://i.imgur.com/YErwzZj.png)

Sorry if it looks flat I... turned my graphics down because... performance, yeah...

> Sorry if it looks flat I... turned my graphics down because... performance, yeah...

The flag in the eyeball made me bust out laughing... 

I would +Rep you, but I've reached my rep-giving limit for today it seems. Noooo.

> 
> The flag in the eyeball made me bust out laughing... 
> I would +Rep you, but I've reached my rep-giving limit for today it seems. Noooo.

Done on your behalf ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Val bailing out a solid-rocket-plane ... twice.

![aaMNeuo.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/aaMNeuo.png?1)

![cSJD0ld.jpg?1](http://i.imgur.com/cSJD0ld.jpg?1)

There's also this, which \*cough\* may or may not be in-game footage:

![MlyvQyd.png](http://i.imgur.com/MlyvQyd.png)

![WRtpSx1.png](http://i.imgur.com/WRtpSx1.png)

Val enjoying her new jet tumbling out of control.

Better shot:

[![screenshot209_zpsykzvgrg5.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot209_zpsykzvgrg5.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot209_zpsykzvgrg5.png.html)

Navigating an around-the-world cruise in the VACUOUS (Very Ambitious Circumnavigator Upon Oceans and Up Shores):

[![17802792539_9ec9671610_z.jpg](https://c2.staticflickr.com/8/7727/17802792539_9ec9671610_z.jpg)](https://flic.kr/p/t8aXYX)

Doing paranormal experiments (not the best pic of her, but at least she's grinning):

[![17366436714_4595685a91_z.jpg](https://c1.staticflickr.com/9/8879/17366436714_4595685a91_z.jpg)](https://flic.kr/p/ssBwAE)
how about 16k resolution?

> 
> Navigating an around-the-world cruise in the VACUOUS (Very Ambitious Circumnavigator Upon Oceans and Up Shores)

Is there any way I could get this in a higher resolution?

> 
> how about 16k resolution?

That's fine, I can edit it down as needed. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Is there any way I could get this in a higher resolution?

That's all I got for that particular shot. But the cruise continues so I'll just take another.
